page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: This area of Ramsgate and Broadstairs is a mixture of seaside,light industry,farmland and areas of old and modern housing(council and private) with many busy shopping streets.The decline of the holiday trade(at its peak during the Victorian era) and the closure of Ramsgate civil airport(now a school,housing and industrial estate) have led to the growth of light manufacturing on 2 well defined industrial estates.Arable land bordering the area produces mostly root vegetables and brassicas. One cinema,a casino,nightclubs and amusement arcades are the main entertainments in Ramsgate whilst Broadstairs boasts a more leisurely atmosphere for the mainly retired population.Broadstairs offers largely private housing and has a number of buildings of historic interest.
